The Oblitercons/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Jaws/Punch:





Dark One stood in a corridor of the Iron Fist with the four other Oblitercons 
and activated his comm. unit.
"Zardus, this is Dark One.  We request our payment and would like it upgraded 
from 90 kilograms to 226 kilograms.  We also request a place in either the 
Iron Fist or the Alliance Base where we can make modifications to ourselves." 
 He ended his transmission to give Zardus an opportunity to reply.

"What modifications?" Pyro asked.

"Don't worry, it's only for Breakdown and Scavenger."

"What?" Breakdown yelled, Scavenger saying the same thing.  "Why us?"

"Because I'm in charge and said so!  What's your problem?  You'll be more 
powerful!"

---

Scattershot sat in the lab of the Iron Fist and had finished welding 
Serpentor's head over his own.  Now he had Soundwave AKA Nightstriker's body 
as his armor, except it didn't cover his fame, which now Scattershot's newly 
repaired head did.  So when he was attacked a whole layer of armor would have 
to be blown apart.

"I am no longer Scattershot, but Scatterblaster!" he screamed, bursting into 
evil laughter.  He opened a comm. link and entered into the IGL, receiving an 
acknowledgement.

---

Jaws continued swimming underwater as a patrol unit, working out that he'd be 
in the Regular Division of the IGL.

---

Punch had had enough of pondering what to do and sent a transmissoin to 
Zardus.  "This is Punch at the bridge of the Alliance Base, requesting 
permission to enter the IGL tournament for the glory of the Alliance."
